sketches.name: figure
sketches.info: A simple work looking at perception of what is figure, what is ground in two dimensional space

sketches.name: interference
sketches.info: Observation of two overlapping fields of lines. mouse/touch position affects the work

sketches.name: interferenceFuncOne
sketches.info: Second variation of two overlapping fields of lines. Be patient, this sketch takes a few seconds to initiate.

sketches.name: interferenceFuncTwo
sketches.info: Third variation of  two opposing fields of lines.

sketches.name: sketchZero
sketches.info: constrained asynchronous movements of neighburing shapes.
